articles.title: The starting grid now set for the 2024 24 Hours of Le Mans! - 24 Heures du Mans
articles.description: With a record number of Hypercars (23), a hotly contested LMP2 class and the LMGT3s making their début, all the racing classes are seemingly wide open. It was tough trying to work out the pecking order before the first practice sessions but now, after four fr…
